name: VA Loan Â· Zero Down Payment
description: Zero down payment for eligible veterans, potentially lower rates.
benefit_summary: May reduce required down payment to 0% and slightly lower interest rate.

name: California First-Time Homebuyer Assistance
description: State-sponsored down payment assistance for first-time homebuyers in California.
benefit_summary: Up to $20,000 in down payment assistance, reduced closing costs.

name: Texas State Down Payment Assistance
description: Texas state program offering down payment and closing cost assistance.
benefit_summary: Up to $15,000 in assistance, flexible income limits.

name: Low-Income Special Program
description: Special mortgage program for low-income families with relaxed credit requirements.
benefit_summary: Lower credit score requirements, higher DTI tolerance, reduced fees.

name: High DTI Accommodation Program
description: Program designed for borrowers with high debt-to-income ratios but strong credit.
benefit_summary: Allows DTI up to 60% for qualified borrowers with excellent credit scores.

name: Senior Homebuyer Program (60+)
description: Specialized mortgage products for seniors aged 60 and above.
benefit_summary: Reduced rates, flexible repayment terms, reverse mortgage options.

name: Washington First-Time Homebuyer Program
description: Washington state assistance for first-time homebuyers.
benefit_summary: Down payment assistance up to $12,000, competitive interest rates.

name: California Affordable Housing Initiative
description: Comprehensive affordable housing program combining multiple assistance options.
benefit_summary: Combined down payment and closing cost assistance, income-based eligibility.
